{{Translation|'''Flower Ninja Art'''|花忍法|Hana Ninpō}} is a subset of [[ninjutsu]] and [[genjutsu]] involving secret flower-oriented techniques used by a clan in the [[Land of Vegetables]]. The two known users of flower ninja art are [[Kikunojō]] and [[Yurinojō]].

== Trivia ==
* In several games, [[Ino Yamanaka]] and [[Kurenai Yūhi]] make use of techniques resembling the Flower Ninja Art.

[[pt-br:Arte Ninja de Flor]]
[[pl:Hana Ninpō]]
